anek athata janathawage ayithiwasikam kappadu karamin, owun krura lesa thala pelamin, mahajana mudal kollakamin, rate sampath noratunta wikunamin jada palanayak gena giya siyalu nayakayan balayata paminiyeda, digatama balaye sitiyeda dharmishta samajayak, dushanayen bhishanayen thora ratak, deshiya chinthanayak mahajanaya idiriye mawa pamini.
